comment.author: 64449805@N00
comment._content: wonderful pic - I can tell you it is not long after the regent opened in March 1929, must be later that year or 1930 because the sign says 'talkies' and they werent regular until about 1930, and Wentworth House, next door under construction, opened Feb 1930, so that makes this late 1929 I rekon.
